item_category: Featuring a prominent metal unibody, one of the Lenovo's thinnest and most powerful Android tablets lets you tap into non-stop entertainment. Doubling as a great productivity device that also packs a first-class keyboard and Lenovo Precision Pen 2, you can now do more while on the go.
review_title: Dislike Productivity Mode and language function
review_text: Disappointed that there is no fingerprint sensor...

Overall works fine mostly, and the screen quality is great.
I really hate Productivity Mode - there's no option to permanently disable this and I have to disable it from Setting each time I open the device. I hope it will be improved with new driver soon.
Also, the keyboard is not great, especially if you use multiple languages input. I have to keep pressing the language button to change between the languages and hope it changes if I were lucky. It works once in 10-15 times. And languages switches unintentionally and randomly while typing. It needs to be stabilised. Otherwise, it is not useable as a "pro" devise. If you only use English, it might be ok.
